name: @hoprnet/hopr-chat
description: Interactive chat PoC for HOPR Protocol

scripts.clean:all: yarn clean:lib && yarn clean:hopr-chat && yarn util:clean:all && yarn clean:zip
scripts.compile: yarn clean:hopr-chat && ncc build index.ts -o hopr-chat && copyfiles package.json .env.demo start-hopr-chat.bat start-hopr-chat.sh start-hopr-chat.command hopr-chat && yarn util:compile
scripts.util:compile: copyfiles node_modules/@hoprnet/hopr-core hopr-chat && move-file hopr-chat/.env.demo hopr-chat/.env
scripts.start:alice: yarn util:create:alice && cd .alice && cross-env HOST_IPV4=0.0.0.0:9091 node lib/index.js -p alice 2>log.alice.txt
scripts.start:bob: yarn util:create:bob && cd .bob && cross-env HOST_IPV4=0.0.0.0:9092 node lib/index.js -p bob 2>log.bob.txt
scripts.zip:windows: yarn clean:zip && rimraf ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.command ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.sh && bestzip hopr-chat-nodebin-windows.zip hopr-chat
scripts.zip:macos: yarn clean:zip && rimraf ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.bat ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.sh && bestzip hopr-chat-nodebin-macos.zip hopr-chat
scripts.zip:linux: yarn clean:zip && rimraf ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.bat ./hopr-chat/start-hopr-chat.command && bestzip hopr-chat-nodebin-linux.zip hopr-chat
